cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

The paper discusses the use of neural sequence-to-sequence models to generate simplified titles for scientific articles, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR), both of which are covered in cs.CL. The paper also mentions the use of statistics from ResearchGate, which is a platform for sharing scientific research, indicating a potential overlap with cs.IR. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of machine learning techniques, which are commonly used in the fields of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and deep learning (cs.DL).
